类 GameState

  • java.lang.Object
    • GameState

  • public class GameState
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to read and check user's guess, provide hints, check if user winning the game or not.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • GameState

        public GameState(java.lang.String target,
                 int guess,
                 int hints)
        Constructor,set a state for each target with specified upper limits of guesses and hints. Initially, store all the characters of the target into the "not" arraylist,which will be used to store characters not guessed yet. The characters correctly guessed are store in the "got" arraylist.
        参数:
        target -
        guess -
        hints -

    • 方法详细资料

      • showWord

        void showWord(java.lang.String word)
        Show characters that are correctly guessed, while "-" stands for letters still left to guess.
        参数:
        word -

      • checkGuess

        public int checkGuess()
        Check guess either by letter or word with recording one increment of guess action, regardless of right or wrong guess.
        返回:
        integer value indicates the input type is word, algebra or "?" for later system message display.

        public int checkByLetter(char letterInput)
